    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Bomb
    Represents a bomb entity in the game.
    BombAnalyzer
    Analyseur spécialisé dans la détection des bombes et zones dangereuses.
    BotPlayer
    Contrôleur du Bot Bomberman implémentant une IA avancée.
    Flag
    Represents a flag in Capture the Flag game mode.
    GameApplication
    Main entry point for the Bomberman game application.
    GameData
    Utility class that holds global game configuration data such as game speed.
    GameMap
    Represents the visual and logical game map composed of tiles.
    GameMapController
    Controller class responsible for managing the game map, including player movements, bomb placements, power-up handling, and transitions to the game over screen.
    GameMapController.PlayerContext
    Inner class for storing a player, their cell, and controls
    GameMapControllerbot
    Contrôleur pour la gestion de la carte du jeu avec un bot.
    GameMapControllerFlag
    GameMapControllerFlag extends GameMapController to implement Capture the Flag mechanics.
    GameMapControllerFlag.Flag
    Inner class representing a flag in Capture the Flag mode.
    GameMapControllerFlag.PlayerContext
    Inner class for storing a player, their cell, and controls
    GameOverController
    Controller for the Game Over screen in the game.
    ImageLibrary
    Utility class containing constant paths to image resources used in the game.
    InputHandler
    Handles loading, saving, and managing player input configurations for a game.
    InputHandler.PlayerControls
    Encapsulates the key controls for a single player.
    LevelEditorController
    Controller class responsible for managing the game map, including player movements, bomb placements, power-up handling, and transitions to the game over screen.
    MenuController
    Controller for managing the main menu and submenus of the game.
    MovementStrategy
    Stratégie de mouvement coordonnant l'analyse et la recherche de chemin.
    MusicLibrary
    A utility class that stores constant file names for background music tracks.
    MusicPlayer
    Utility class for playing background music tracks with support for different modes such as normal play, loop, and random track selection.
    MusicPlayer.Mode
    Enumeration of playback modes.
    Node
    Nœud pour l'algorithme A*.
    NouveauProfilController
    Controller for creating new player profiles.
    OptionsController
    Controller responsible for handling the options/settings menu in the game.
    PathFinder
    Chercheur de chemins utilisant l'algorithme A*.
    PlacedBomb
    Represents a bomb that has been placed on the game map, including its position, explosion time, and blast range.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game, with position, power-ups, state, movement timing, and the ability to place bombs.
    Player.State
    Enum representing the possible states of a player.
    PlayerManager
    Manages player profiles including creation, deletion, loading, saving, and maintaining statistics like games played and won.
    PlayerManager.Player
    Represents a player profile with personal information and game statistics.
    PowerUp
    Represents a power-up that a player can collect during gameplay.
    PowerUp.Power
    Enumeration of the possible power-up types.
    ProfilsController
    Controller for managing player profiles.
    ResourceLoader
    Utility class for creating JavaFX nodes with pixelated or textured images.
    ScoreManager
    Manages the scores for Player 1 and Player 2.
    SFXLibrary
    A library of constants representing sound effect (SFX) file names used in the game.
    SFXPlayer
    Utility class to manage playback of sound effects (SFX) in the game.
